biography.bio: Zofia Slaboszowska was born on September 11, 1933 in Poland. She was an actress, known for Ogniomistrz Kalen (1961), Gdzie jestes, Luizo? (1964) and Spotkania w mroku (1960). She was married to Helmut Schreiber. She died on August 13, 2004 in Herzberg am Harz, Lower Saxony, Germany.
biography.name: Zofia Slaboszowska

biography.bio: Jürgen Frohriep was born on April 28, 1928 in Rostock, Germany. He was an actor and writer, known for Bukow and König (1971), Stars (1959) and Alarm am See (1973). He was married to Kati Székely and Ingeborg Schumacher. He died on July 13, 1993 in Berlin, Germany.
biography.name: Jürgen Frohriep

biography.bio: Ernst Kahler was born on November 7, 1914 in Berlin, Germany. He was an actor and director, known for Ihr letztes Rendezvous (1969), Die Nacht zwischen Donnerstag und Freitag (1966) and Das Eiszapfenherz (1975). He died on June 18, 1993 in Berlin.
biography.name: Ernst Kahler

biography.bio: Bruno Carstens was born on October 26, 1918 in Wilhelmshaven, Germany. He was an actor and assistant director, known for Blaulicht (1959), Optimistische Tragödie (1971) and Nicht verzagen, Trudchen fragen (1980). He was married to Isot Kilian. He died on October 30, 2001 in Saalfeld, Thuringia, Germany.
biography.name: Bruno Carstens

biography.bio: Peter Paul Goes was born on December 24, 1914 in Hamburg, Germany. He was an actor, known for Nu parmi les loups (1963), Das standhafte Fräulein (1959) and Totentanz (1962). He died on October 6, 1962 in East Berlin, East Germany.
biography.name: Peter Paul Goes

biography.bio: Peter Dommisch was born on August 1, 1934 in Berlin, Germany. He was an actor, known for Die goldene Gans (1964), Der Tote und sein General (1960) and Der arme Jonathan (1963). He died on January 4, 1991 in Berlin.
biography.name: Peter Dommisch

biography.placeOfBirth: Költschen, Brandenburg, Germany [now Kolczyn, Lubuskie, Poland]
biography.bio: Eva-Maria Hagen was born on October 19, 1934 in Költschen, Brandenburg, Germany as Eva-Maria Buchholz. She is known for her work on Dinosaurier (2009), Lore (2012) and Ware für Katalonien (1959). She was previously married to Hans Oliva.
biography.name: Eva-Maria Hagen

biography.bio: Achim Hübner was born on October 8, 1929 in Berlin, Germany. He was a director and actor, known for Ein sonderbares Mädchen (1967), Glücksperlen (1978) and Solo für Martina (1980). He died on August 25, 2014 in Berlin.
biography.name: Achim Hübner

biography.bio: Atilla Kiliç is an actor, known for Dirilis: Ertugrul (2014), Josef und seine Brüder (1962) and Die rote Kamille (1963).
biography.name: Atilla Kiliç

biography.bio: Günter Naumann was born on November 17, 1925 in Chemnitz, Saxony, Germany. He was an actor, known for Bukow and König (1971), Two in a Boat (1999) and Front ohne Gnade (1984). He died on November 6, 2009 in Köpenick, Berlin, Germany.
biography.name: Günter Naumann

biography.bio: Günther Neubert is an assistant director and actor, known for Fünf Patronenhülsen (1960), Immer am Weg dein Gesicht (1960) and Verwirrung der Liebe (1959).
biography.name: Günther Neubert

biography.bio: Bernd Trewendt is an actor, known for Sie nannten ihn Amigo (1959) and Immer am Weg dein Gesicht (1960).
biography.name: Bernd Trewendt

biography.bio: Thomas Weisgerber was born on January 17, 1929 in Hannover, Germany. He is an actor, known for Alaskafüchse (1964), Schüsse unterm Galgen (1968) and Apachen (1973).
biography.name: Thomas Weisgerber
